Character Description: A reclusive antiquarian with a dark past, Victor possesses an unusual collection of occult artifacts. His obsession borders on madness.
A paranormal investigator who has seen her fair share of terrifying events. She's tough, resourceful, and never backs down from a ghost or demon.
A brilliant yet eccentric scientist who dabbles in the forbidden realms of genetic experimentation. His creations often have horrifying consequences.
A small-town girl who discovers she has psychic abilities after a traumatic experience. She struggles to control and understand her newfound powers.
A hardened detective with a cynical view of the world. He's assigned to investigate a series of bizarre and grisly murders, which push him to question his own sanity.
A wealthy businessman who has made a fortune in real estate. His latest purchase is an old, abandoned mansion rumored to be haunted. He sees it as just another opportunity for profit.
An elderly widow living alone in the woods. She's kind-hearted but strange, with a mysterious past that involves ancient rituals and dark magic.
A former priest who was expelled from his church due to allegations of satanic practices. He now leads a secret cult and seeks to bring about the end of days.
A young woman struggling with mental illness after a terrifying encounter with a supernatural entity. She's tormented by nightmares and haunted by the feeling that she's not alone.
A journalist who specializes in investigating unsolved mysteries. He takes on a story about a cursed object, leading him down a path of terror and darkness.
A medium who can communicate with the spirits of the dead. She's sought out by those in need of closure but sometimes finds herself drawn into dangerous situations.
A university professor specializing in the study of the occult. He delves too deep into forbidden knowledge, awakening something ancient and malevolent.
A police officer with a troubled past. She's haunted by the ghost of a victim she failed to save, driving her to seek redemption through solving an unsolved serial killer case.
A Native American shaman who uses his spiritual powers to protect his tribe from supernatural threats. He's a guardian of ancient wisdom and a guide through the darkest realms.
